It's hard to believe, but,"},{"lineNumber":33775,"originalJapaneseLine":"　空を飛んで、こちらへ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"it’s flying through the sky towards us...!"},{"lineNumber":33776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「浮いていることしか出来ぬと聞いたが……","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard it could only float..."},{"lineNumber":33777,"originalJapaneseLine":"　擬態であったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Was it an illusion?"},{"lineNumber":33778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、どうやらトッポスを利用して、","translatedEnglishLine":"No, apparently they're using Toppos,"},{"lineNumber":33779,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴に引っ張って運ばせているようで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"having it pull and carry them..."},{"lineNumber":33780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………なんと」","translatedEnglishLine":"...What a thing."},{"lineNumber":33781,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒りや敵意よりもまず、","translatedEnglishLine":"More than anger or hostility,"},{"lineNumber":33782,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフは呆れに似た驚きが湧いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Stroganoff felt a surprise akin to disbelief."},{"lineNumber":33783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのような手で来るとは……やるものだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"To come at us with such a tactic... impressive."},{"lineNumber":33784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いかがしましょうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what should we do?"},{"lineNumber":33785,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現在、奴らは魔物界に侵入して……」","translatedEnglishLine":"They have now invaded the demon realm..."},{"lineNumber":33786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「慌てるな。奴らの目的は読めておる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't panic. I can read their objective."},{"lineNumber":33787,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス様のお命と、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's Lord Kayblis's life,"},{"lineNumber":33788,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リトルプリンセスの身柄であろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"and the custody of the Little Princess."},{"lineNumber":33789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ……！　ではここの防備を固めて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes...! location is, by Lord Kayblis's order,"},{"lineNumber":33793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　徹底的に伏せておる。","translatedEnglishLine":"thoroughly concealed."},{"lineNumber":33794,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間共も、容易には知れるまい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even the humans won't easily find it."},{"lineNumber":33795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「兵は動かせば隠せぬもの。","translatedEnglishLine":"Troops cannot be concealed once moved."},{"lineNumber":33796,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兵を集めるのは、居場所を教えるのと同じ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gathering soldiers is the same as revealing one's location."},{"lineNumber":33797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「各都市に伝達して、飛行魔物兵で迎撃させよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Inform each city and have flying demon troops intercept them."},{"lineNumber":33798,"originalJapaneseLine":"　狙えるならば、トッポスとの連結を切れ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If possible, sever the connection with Toppos."},{"lineNumber":33799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、ははッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ha, haha!"},{"lineNumber":33800,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この旨、ケイブリス様には……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will report this to Lord Kayblis..."},{"lineNumber":33801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂が折を見てお伝えする。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will find the right time to inform him."},{"lineNumber":33802,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、ケイブリス様は…………","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, Lord Kayblis is..."},{"lineNumber":33803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Eep..."},{"lineNumber":33804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王への階段を……登っておられる所だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Climbing the steps... to becoming the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":33805,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うかつに、水を差せぬ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We must not carelessly interfere."},{"lineNumber":33806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリス様があんなに叩き続けて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Kayblis keeps striking like that,"},{"lineNumber":33807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ死なないなんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and still hasn’t died..."},{"lineNumber":33808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂らは彼のお方をお助けするのが役目。","translatedEnglishLine":"Our duty is to assist him."},{"lineNumber":33809,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかとかかれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Move forward steadily."},{"lineNumber":33810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、ははっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yes, haha!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私ずっと、あの走ってくる魔物に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been constantly chased by that running monster

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追われてるのですが！　もう四日くらい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been about four days already!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううううー、ぶっ飛ばしていいですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uuuu— can I just bash it away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法、撃ってもいいですよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it okay if I use magic to attack?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『絶対駄目だってーの！　あんたも危ないし！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely not! It's dangerous for you too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カレー作って待っておくから頑張んなさい！』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make curry and wait for you, so hang in there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、う、ういーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yesーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の麓を駆け抜けて、更に西へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rushing past the foot of Mount Shoryu, even further west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、とーーーーう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hyaaahーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノラインの上空を越えるアニスを追って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chasing Anis flying over the Maginot Line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トッポスは一気に要塞の壁を飛び越えて駆けていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toppos leaps over the fortress walls in one bound and runs forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、跳びましたよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa, it jumped!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽーんって、自分の身長より遙かに高く！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Poing! Much higher than its own height!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「泳ぐし走るし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It swims and runs...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホント、ごつい癖に俊敏だな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, for something so bulky, it's agile...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統。……そろそろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander... it's about time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。くく、驚くがいい魔軍ども」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. Heh heh, prepare to be surprised, demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦開始から五度目の太陽が昇り、そして沈んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fifth sun has risen and set since the operation began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空の様相も変わり、大気すら禍々しさを帯びる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sky has changed, and even the atmosphere grows ominous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城はついに、魔物界へと入り込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle finally entered the demon realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間共の、浮き城が……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The humans' floating castle...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大元帥ストロガノフは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Great Demon Marshal Stroganoff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その報告を受け、僅かに眉を動かした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: received the report and slightly moved his brows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ……！　信じがたいことですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haha...! It's hard to believe, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空を飛んで、こちらへ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s flying through the sky towards us...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「浮いていることしか出来ぬと聞いたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard it could only float...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 擬態であったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was it an illusion?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、どうやらトッポスを利用して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, apparently they're using Toppos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴に引っ張って運ばせているようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: having it pull and carry them...
...What a thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りや敵意よりもまず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than anger or hostility,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは呆れに似た驚きが湧いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff felt a surprise akin to disbelief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのような手で来るとは……やるものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To come at us with such a tactic... impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いかがしましょうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、奴らは魔物界に侵入して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have now invaded the demon realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「慌てるな。奴らの目的は読めておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't panic. I can read their objective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様のお命と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's Lord Kayblis's life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルプリンセスの身柄であろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the custody of the Little Princess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……！　ではここの防備を固めて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes...! Then we fortify defenses here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この所在は、ケイブリス様の命により
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This location is, by Lord Kayblis's order,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的に伏せておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thoroughly concealed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共も、容易には知れるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the humans won't easily find it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵は動かせば隠せぬもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Troops cannot be concealed once moved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵を集めるのは、居場所を教えるのと同じ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gathering soldiers is the same as revealing one's location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各都市に伝達して、飛行魔物兵で迎撃させよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inform each city and have flying demon troops intercept them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狙えるならば、トッポスとの連結を切れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, sever the connection with Toppos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha, haha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この旨、ケイブリス様には……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will report this to Lord Kayblis...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂が折を見てお伝えする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will find the right time to inform him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、ケイブリス様は…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, Lord Kayblis is...
Eep...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王への階段を……登っておられる所だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climbing the steps... to becoming the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うかつに、水を差せぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not carelessly interfere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリス様があんなに叩き続けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kayblis keeps striking like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ死なないなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and still hasn’t died...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂らは彼のお方をお助けするのが役目。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our duty is to assist him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかとかかれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move forward steadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes, haha!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私ずっと、あの走ってくる魔物に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been constantly chased by that running monster

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追われてるのですが！　もう四日くらい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been about four days already!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううううー、ぶっ飛ばしていいですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uuuu— can I just bash it away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法、撃ってもいいですよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it okay if I use magic to attack?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『絶対駄目だってーの！　あんたも危ないし！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely not! It's dangerous for you too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カレー作って待っておくから頑張んなさい！』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make curry and wait for you, so hang in there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、う、ういーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yesーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の麓を駆け抜けて、更に西へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rushing past the foot of Mount Shoryu, even further west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、とーーーーう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hyaaahーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノラインの上空を越えるアニスを追って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chasing Anis flying over the Maginot Line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トッポスは一気に要塞の壁を飛び越えて駆けていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toppos leaps over the fortress walls in one bound and runs forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、跳びましたよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa, it jumped!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽーんって、自分の身長より遙かに高く！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Poing! Much higher than its own height!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「泳ぐし走るし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It swims and runs...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホント、ごつい癖に俊敏だな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, for something so bulky, it's agile...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統。……そろそろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander... it's about time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。くく、驚くがいい魔軍ども」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. Heh heh, prepare to be surprised, demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦開始から五度目の太陽が昇り、そして沈んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fifth sun has risen and set since the operation began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空の様相も変わり、大気すら禍々しさを帯びる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sky has changed, and even the atmosphere grows ominous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城はついに、魔物界へと入り込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle finally entered the demon realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間共の、浮き城が……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The humans' floating castle...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大元帥ストロガノフは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Great Demon Marshal Stroganoff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その報告を受け、僅かに眉を動かした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: received the report and slightly moved his brows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ……！　信じがたいことですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haha...! It's hard to believe, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空を飛んで、こちらへ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s flying through the sky towards us...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「浮いていることしか出来ぬと聞いたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard it could only float...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 擬態であったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was it an illusion?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、どうやらトッポスを利用して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, apparently they're using Toppos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴に引っ張って運ばせているようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: having it pull and carry them...
...What a thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りや敵意よりもまず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than anger or hostility,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは呆れに似た驚きが湧いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff felt a surprise akin to disbelief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのような手で来るとは……やるものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To come at us with such a tactic... impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いかがしましょうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、奴らは魔物界に侵入して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have now invaded the demon realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「慌てるな。奴らの目的は読めておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't panic. I can read their objective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様のお命と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's Lord Kayblis's life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルプリンセスの身柄であろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the custody of the Little Princess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……！　ではここの防備を固めて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes...! Then we fortify defenses here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この所在は、ケイブリス様の命により
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This location is, by Lord Kayblis's order,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的に伏せておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thoroughly concealed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共も、容易には知れるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the humans won't easily find it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵は動かせば隠せぬもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Troops cannot be concealed once moved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵を集めるのは、居場所を教えるのと同じ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gathering soldiers is the same as revealing one's location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各都市に伝達して、飛行魔物兵で迎撃させよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inform each city and have flying demon troops intercept them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狙えるならば、トッポスとの連結を切れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, sever the connection with Toppos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha, haha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この旨、ケイブリス様には……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will report this to Lord Kayblis...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂が折を見てお伝えする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will find the right time to inform him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、ケイブリス様は…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, Lord Kayblis is...
Eep...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王への階段を……登っておられる所だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climbing the steps... to becoming the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うかつに、水を差せぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not carelessly interfere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリス様があんなに叩き続けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kayblis keeps striking like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ死なないなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and still hasn’t died...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂らは彼のお方をお助けするのが役目。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our duty is to assist him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかとかかれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move forward steadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes, haha!
